feature1.explanation: Both texts use parentheses and hyphens, showing similarity in punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar level of lexical variation and word choice, suggesting a consistent writing style.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures and coherence in the texts are comparable, indicating a common writing style.

feature4.explanation: Both texts adopt a similar tone and mood, reflecting a shared narrative style.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were noted in either text, indicating consistency in this aspect.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, there is a high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
